bibl.title: P. Duke Inv. 766: le plus ancien témoin papyrologique d'un canon poétique liturgique.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.seg: Alan Gampel & Céline Grassien, P. Duke Inv. 766: le plus ancien témoin papyrologique d'un canon poétique liturgique.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume I. Literary Papyri: Texts and Studies = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 561-590, 1 pl.
